meanings.definition: Not conducive to good health; unhealthy.
meanings.sent1: Eating too much candy is unhealthful for your body.
meanings.sent2: The doctor warned that smoking is unhealthful for your lungs.
meanings.sent3: It's unhealthful to stay up all night watching TV instead of sleeping.
meanings.sent4: The polluted air in the city felt unhealthful to her lungs.
meanings.sent5: The lack of exercise and fresh air made her lifestyle unhealthful.

meanings.sent1: Drinking unhealthful amounts of soda can lead to weight gain.
meanings.sent2: Excessive sun exposure can be unhealthful for your skin.
meanings.sent3: He joked that eating a whole cake in one sitting would be unhealthful.
meanings.sent4: The toxic fumes from the factory were unhealthful to the workers.
meanings.sent5: The lack of proper nutrition in his diet was unhealthful for his overall well-being.
